{{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: PREFIX rdf: SELECT (SAMPLE(?aLink) as ?Link) (SAMPLE(?aName) as ?Name) (CONCAT('
    ', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Synonym), '
') AS ?Namenssynonyme) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aAffiliation) as ?Orden) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aTätigkeit) as ?Tätigkeit) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Birth) as ?Geburt) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Death) as ?Tod) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Wirkungsort) as ?Wirkungsorte) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Wirkungszeit) as ?Wirkungszeitraum) WHERE { ?Page rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf retmoc:Person . {{#if: {{{Name|}}}| ?Page retmop:Name{{!}}retmop:VariantName ?searchName filter contains(lcase(?searchName), lcase("{{{Name}}}") ) . |}} {{#if: {{{OrganizationName|}}}| ?Page retmop:Affiliation ?Affiliation . ?Affiliation retmop:OrganizationName ?searchAffiliationName filter contains(lcase(?searchAffiliationName), lcase("{{{OrganizationName}}}") ) . |}} {{#if: {{{Occupation|}}}| ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?searchTätigkeit . ?searchTätigkeit retmop:EventType "Tätigkeit" . ?searchTätigkeit retmop:EventDescription ?searchTätigkeitDescription filter contains(lcase(?searchTätigkeitDescription), lcase("{{{Occupation}}}") ) . |}} {{#if: {{{Place|}}}| ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?searchOrt . ?searchOrt retmop:Place/retmop:PlaceName ?searchOrtName filter contains(lcase(?searchOrtName), lcase("{{{Place}}}") ) . |}} {{#if: {{{Date|}}}| ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?searchDate . ?searchDate retmop:Date{{!}}retmop:DateEnd ?searchDates filter contains(STR(?searchDates), "{{{Date}}}" ) . |}} ?Page retmop:Name ?aName . BIND(CONCAT('') as ?aLink) . OPTIONAL { SELECT ?Page ?Synonym WHERE { ?Page retmop:VariantName ?VariantName . BIND(IF(BOUND(?VariantName), CONCAT('
  • ', ?VariantName, '
    • '), "") AS ?Synonym) . } ORDER BY LCASE(?VariantName) } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Affiliation ?Affiliation . ?Affiliation retmop:OrganizationName ?AffiliationName . BIND(CONCAT('',?AffiliationName,'') as ?aAffiliation) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?Event . ?Event retmop:EventType "Tätigkeit" . ?Event retmop:EventDescription ?EventDescription . BIND(IF(BOUND(?EventDescription), CONCAT('
  • ', ?EventDescription, '
    • '), "") AS ?aTätigkeit) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?bEvent . ?bEvent retmop:EventType "Geburt" . OPTIONAL { ?bEvent retmop:Place/retmop:PlaceName ?bPlace . } OPTIONAL { ?bEvent retmop:Date ?bDate . } BIND(CONCAT('Ort: ', IF(BOUND(?bPlace), ?bPlace, ""), '
    ', 'Jahr: ', IF(BOUND(?bDate), STR(YEAR(?bDate)), ""), '
    ') as ?Birth) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?cEvent . ?cEvent retmop:EventType "Tod" . OPTIONAL { ?cEvent retmop:Place/retmop:PlaceName ?cPlace . } OPTIONAL { ?cEvent retmop:Date ?cDate . } BIND(CONCAT('Ort: ', IF(BOUND(?cPlace), ?cPlace, ""), '
    ', 'Jahr: ', IF(BOUND(?cDate), STR(YEAR(?cDate)), ""), '
    ') as ?Death) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?dEvent . ?dEvent retmop:EventType "Wirkungsort" . ?dEvent retmop:Place/retmop:PlaceName ?dPlace . BIND(IF(BOUND(?dPlace), CONCAT('
  • ', ?dPlace, '
    • '), "") AS ?Wirkungsort) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?eEvent . ?eEvent retmop:EventType "Wirkungszeitraum" . ?eEvent retmop:Date ?DateStart . OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateEnd ?DateEnd .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateCertain ?dc .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateVague ?dv .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateEndCertain ?dec .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateEndVague ?dev .} BIND (IF(BOUND(?dc), ?dc, 0) AS ?DateCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dv), ?dv, 0) AS ?DateVague) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dec), ?dec, 0) AS ?DateEndCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dev), ?dev, 0) AS ?DateEndVague) . BIND ( IF( ?DateCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))), CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), " (?)") ) as ?DateStartConcated ) . BIND ( IF( ?DateEndCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd))), CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd)), " (?)") ) as ?DateEndConcated ) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?DateEnd), CONCAT(?DateStartConcated, " - ", ?DateEndConcated), ?DateStartConcated) as ?Wirkungszeit) . } } GROUP BY ?Page ORDER BY LCASE(?Name) |config=fuseki |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px }}     [[Category:Query]]

  • [[Volume::x1]]
  • |}} |} ===Liste aller im Sammelband enthaltenen Beiträge und dort editierten Autoren und Werke=== {{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: PREFIX rdf: SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPublicationAuthor) AS ?Editor) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aInCollection) AS ?Titel) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?PageRange) AS ?Seitenangabe) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?PageRangeOfEditedText) AS ?Seitenangabe_Edition) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?WorkAuthor) AS ?Autor_Werk) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?EditedTextNote) AS ?Zuschreibung_Autorenschaft) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aLanguage) AS ?Übersetzung) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aWorkPart) AS ?Werkteil) WHERE { ?InCollection retmop:IsPublishedIn page:{{PAGENAMEE}} . ?InCollection retmop:Title ?Title . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?Title,'
    • ') as ?aInCollection) . OPTIONAL { ?InCollection retmop:PublicationAuthor ?PublicationAuthor . ?PublicationAuthor retmop:Name ?PublicationAuthorName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PublicationAuthorName,'
    • ') as ?aPublicationAuthor) . } OPTIONAL { ?InCollection retmop:PageRange ?PageRange . } ?InCollection retmop:Incorporates ?EditedText . OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:Note ?EditedTextNote } OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:PageRangeOfEditedText ?PageRangeOfEditedText } ?EditedText retmop:IsEditionOf ?Work . ?Work retmop:Has_subobject ?AuthorshipSubobject . ?Work retmop:Title ?WorkTitle . ?AuthorshipSubobject a retmoc:Authorship . ?AuthorshipSubobject retmop:WorkCreator ?Author . ?AuthorshipSubobject retmop:WorkAuthorshipAttribution "Echt" . ?Author retmop:Name ?AuthorName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?AuthorName,' : ',?WorkTitle,'
    • ') as ?WorkAuthor) . OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:IsTranslationOf ?Translation . ?EditedText retmop:Language ?Language . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?Language,'
    • ') as ?aLanguage) . } OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:IsEditionOfWorkPart ?WorkPart . ?WorkPart retmop:Heading ?WorkPartHeading . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?WorkPartHeading,'
    • ') as ?aWorkPart) . } } GROUP BY ?EditedText ORDER BY ?Titel |config=fuseki |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} {{#vardefine: SiglumIdentifier|{{{SiglumIdentifier|}}}}} {{#vardefine: Isbn|{{{Isbn|}}}}} {| !Siglum {{#info: Siglum eines Werks (z.B. 'Fauser 10' oder 'CALMA 29') }} !ISBN {{#info: ISBN (International Standard Book Number) eines Buches }} |- |{{#arraymap:{{#var:SiglumIdentifier}}|,|x1|[[SiglumIdentifier::x1]]|}} |[[Isbn::{{#var:Isbn}}]] |} [[Category:Collection]] {{CopyPageId}}

<includeonly>
{{#sparql:
PREFIX retmop: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/Property-3A>
PREFIX retmoc: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/Category-3A>
PREFIX page: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?Erstellungsdaten WHERE 
{ 
    page:{{PAGENAMEE}} retmop:Has_subobject ?z .
    ?z rdf:type retmoc:Date
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:Date ?DateStart .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateEnd ?DateEnd .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateCertain ?dc .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateVague ?dv .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateEndCertain ?dec .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateEndVague ?dev .}
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dc), ?dc, 0) AS ?DateCertain) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dv), ?dv, 0) AS ?DateVague) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dec), ?dec, 0) AS ?DateEndCertain) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dev), ?dev, 0) AS ?DateEndVague) .
    BIND (
        IF(
            ?DateCertain,
            CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))),
            CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), " (?)")
        ) as ?a
    ) .
    BIND (
        IF(
            ?DateEndCertain,
            CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd))),
            CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd)), " (?)")
        ) as ?b
    ) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?DateEnd), CONCAT(?a, " - ", ?b), ?a) as ?Erstellungsdaten) .
}
|chart=sgvizler.visualization.Table
|options=headings=false
}}
</includeonly>
<noinclude>
[[Category:Query]]
</noinclude>

Die Sprache sollte aus einem kontrollierten Vokabular wie den ISO-639-3-Ländercodes ausgewählt werden: http://www.lexvo.org/linkeddata/resources.html ISO-639-3 beinhaltet auch hsitorische Sprachen wie Mittelhochdeutsch (gmh) oder Altenglisch (ang) }} |{{#arraymap:{{{Language|}}}|,|x1|

OPTIONAL {?Subobject retmop:FolioRange ?Foliobereich .} OPTIONAL {?Subobject retmop:PageRange ?Seitenbereich .} OPTIONAL {?Subobject retmop:ManuscriptReferenceNote ?Anmerkung .} } ORDER BY ASC(?Shelfmark) |config=fuseki |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} {{#if: {{{EditionTitle|}}}| {{#set:EditionTitle={{{EditionTitle}}}}} {{DISPLAYTITLE:{{{EditionTitle}}}}} }} {{#vardefine: Source|{{{Source|}}}}} {{#vardefine: Provenance|{{{Provenance|}}}}} [[Category:EditedText]] {| !Quelle {{#info: Quellen der integrierten Daten. In der Regel Angabe des Dateinamens der Quelldatei }} !Herkunft {{#info: Provenienz der integrierten Daten. Je nach Herkunft der Daten: 'ALCUIN', 'RETM2', oder 'RETM3' }} |- |[[Source::{{#var:source}}]] |[[Provenance::{{#var:provenance}}]] |} {{CopyPageId}}

{{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: PREFIX rdf: SELECT (CONCAT('') as ?Link) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aEditor) as ?Editor) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPrinter) as ?Drucker) (SAMPLE(?Title) as ?Publikationstitel) (SAMPLE(?PublicationPlace) as ?Ort) (SAMPLE(?PublicationDate) as ?Jahr) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPublisher) as ?Verlag) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aHerausgeber) AS ?Herausgeber) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aBandnummer) AS ?Bandnummer) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aSeitenangabe) AS ?Seitenangabe) WHERE { ?Page a/rdfs:subClassOf retmoc:Publication . ?Page retmop:Incorporates ?Edition . {{#if: {{{Editor|}}}| ?Edition retmop:Editor ?searchEditorPage. ?searchEditorPage retmop:Name{{!}}retmop:VariantName ?searchName filter contains(lcase(?searchName), lcase("{{{Editor}}}") ) . }} {{#if: {{{Printer|}}}| ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?searchPrinterSubobject . ?searchPrinterSubobject a retmoc:Print . ?searchPrinterSubobject retmop:Printer/retmop:OrganizationName{{!}}retmop:OrganizationAbbreviation ?searchPrinter filter contains(lcase(?searchPrinter), lcase("{{{Printer}}}") ) . }} {{#if: {{{PublicationTitle|}}}| ?Page retmop:Title ?searchTitle filter contains(lcase(?searchTitle), lcase("{{{PublicationTitle}}}") ) . }} {{#if: {{{PublicationPlace|}}}| ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?searchPlaceSubobject . ?searchPlaceSubobject a retmoc:Print . ?searchPlaceSubobject retmop:PublicationPlace/retmop:PlaceName ?searchPlace filter contains(lcase(?searchPlace), lcase("{{{PublicationPlace}}}") ) . }} {{#if: {{{PublicationYear|}}}| ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?searchDateSubobject . ?searchDateSubobject a retmoc:Print . ?searchDateSubobject retmop:Date{{!}}retmop:DateEnd ?searchDate filter contains(STR(?searchDate), "{{{PublicationYear}}}" ) . }} {{#if: {{{Publisher|}}}| ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?searchPublisherSubobject . ?searchPublisherSubobject a retmoc:Print . ?searchPublisherSubobject retmop:Publisher/retmop:OrganizationName{{!}}retmop:OrganizationAbbreviation ?searchPublisher filter contains(lcase(?searchPublisher), lcase("{{{Publisher}}}") ) . }} ?Page retmop:Title ?Title . OPTIONAL { ?Edition retmop:Editor ?EditorPage. ?EditorPage rdfs:label ?EditorLabel . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?EditorLabel,'
    • ') as ?aEditor) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?aPrint . ?aPrint a retmoc:Print . ?aPrint retmop:Printer ?PrinterPage . ?PrinterPage retmop:OrganizationName ?PrinterName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PrinterName,'
    • ') as ?aPrinter) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?bPrint . ?bPrint a retmoc:Print . ?bPrint retmop:PublicationPlace/retmop:PlaceName ?PublicationPlace . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?cPrint . ?cPrint a retmoc:Print . ?cPrint retmop:Date ?DateStart . OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateEnd ?DateEnd .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateCertain ?dc .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateVague ?dv .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateEndCertain ?dec .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateEndVague ?dev .} BIND (IF(BOUND(?dc), ?dc, 0) AS ?DateCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dv), ?dv, 0) AS ?DateVague) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dec), ?dec, 0) AS ?DateEndCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dev), ?dev, 0) AS ?DateEndVague) . BIND ( IF( ?DateCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))), CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), " (?)") ) as ?DateStartConcated ) . BIND ( IF( ?DateEndCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd))), CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd)), " (?)") ) as ?DateEndConcated ) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?DateEnd), CONCAT(?DateStartConcated, " - ", ?DateEndConcated), ?DateStartConcated) as ?PublicationDate) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?dPrint . ?dPrint a retmoc:Print . ?dPrint retmop:Publisher ?PublisherPage. ?PublisherPage retmop:OrganizationName ?PublisherName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PublisherName,'
    • ') as ?aPublisher) . } OPTIONAL { { ?Page retmop:CollectionEditor ?CollectionEditor . } UNION { ?Page retmop:Series ?Series . ?Series retmop:SeriesEditor ?CollectionEditor . } ?CollectionEditor rdfs:label ?CollectionEditorTitle BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?CollectionEditorTitle,'
    • ') as ?aHerausgeber) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Volume ?Volume . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?Volume,'
    • ') as ?aBandnummer) . } OPTIONAL { ?InCollection retmop:IsPublishedIn ?Page . ?InCollection retmop:PageRange ?PageRange . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PageRange,'
    • ') as ?aSeitenangabe) . } } GROUP BY ?Edition ORDER BY LCASE(?Titel) |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }}     [[Category:Query]]

<includeonly>
{{#sparql:
PREFIX retmop: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/Property-3A>
PREFIX page: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?Editionsformen
WHERE {
    {
        ?Incorporates retmop:Incorporates page:{{PAGENAMEE}} .    
        ?Incorporates rdf:type/rdfs:label ?Editionsformen .    
    } UNION {
        page:{{PAGENAMEE}} retmop:IsTranslationOf ?IsTranslationOf .
        BIND(IF(BOUND(?IsTranslationOf), "Übersetzung", "") AS ?Editionsformen) .
    }    
}
|chart=sgvizler.visualization.Table
|options=headings=false
}}
</includeonly>
<noinclude>
[[Category:Query]]
</noinclude>

Editor {{#info: Ein Editor ist Bearbeiter einer Edition (d.h. eines edierten Texts) }}

{|class="flextable" | {|class="wikitable" !Synonyme |{{#arraymap:{{{VariantName|}}}|,|x|[[VariantName::x]]|,\s|}} |- !Ordenszugehörigkeit |{{#if:{{{Affiliation|}}}|[[Affiliation::{{{Affiliation}}}]]}} |- !GND |{{#if:{{{GndIdentifier|}}}|[[GndIdentifier::{{{GndIdentifier}}}]]}} |} |} ===Liste aller Publikationen und der dort edierten Autoren und Werke des Editors=== {{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: PREFIX rdf: SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPublication) AS ?Titel) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPlaceName) AS ?Ort) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPublisher) AS ?Verlag) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?PublicationDate) AS ?Jahr) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aCollectionEditor) AS ?Sammelbandherausgeber) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aSeriesEditor) AS ?Herausgeber) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aSeries) AS ?Reihe) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aBandnummer) AS ?Bandnummer) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?PageRange) AS ?Seitenangabe) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?PageRangeOfEditedText) AS ?Seitenangabe_Edition) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?WorkAuthor) AS ?Autor_Werk) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?EditedTextNote) AS ?Zuschreibung_Autorenschaft) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aLanguage) AS ?Übersetzung) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aWorkPart) AS ?Werkteil) WHERE { ?EditedText retmop:Editor page:{{PAGENAMEE}} . ?Publication retmop:Incorporates ?EditedText . ?Publication retmop:Title ?Title . BIND(CONCAT(?Title,'') as ?aPublication) . OPTIONAL { ?Publication retmop:CollectionEditor ?CollectionEditor . ?CollectionEditor retmop:Name ?CollectionEditorName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?CollectionEditorName,'
    • ') as ?aCollectionEditor) . } OPTIONAL { ?Publication retmop:Series ?Series . ?Series retmop:SeriesTitle ?SeriesTitle . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?SeriesTitle,'
    • ') as ?aSeries) . ?Series retmop:SeriesEditor ?SeriesEditor . ?SeriesEditor retmop:Name ?SeriesEditorName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?SeriesEditorName,'
    • ') as ?aSeriesEditor) . } OPTIONAL { ?Publication retmop:Volume ?Volume . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?Volume,'
    • ') as ?aBandnummer) . } OPTIONAL { ?Publication retmop:Has_subobject ?Print . ?Print a retmoc:Print . OPTIONAL { ?Print retmop:PublicationPlace/retmop:PlaceName ?PlaceName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PlaceName,'
    • ') as ?aPlaceName) . } OPTIONAL { ?Print retmop:Publisher ?Publisher . ?Publisher retmop:OrganizationName ?PublisherName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PublisherName,'
    • ') as ?aPublisher) . } OPTIONAL { ?Print retmop:Date ?DateStart . OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateEnd ?DateEnd .} OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateCertain ?dc .} OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateVague ?dv .} OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateEndCertain ?dec .} OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateEndVague ?dev .} BIND (IF(BOUND(?dc), ?dc, 0) AS ?DateCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dv), ?dv, 0) AS ?DateVague) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dec), ?dec, 0) AS ?DateEndCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dev), ?dev, 0) AS ?DateEndVague) . BIND ( IF( ?DateCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))), CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), " (?)") ) as ?DateStartConcated ) . BIND ( IF( ?DateEndCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd))), CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd)), " (?)") ) as ?DateEndConcated ) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?DateEnd), CONCAT(?DateStartConcated, " - ", ?DateEndConcated), ?DateStartConcated) as ?PublicationDate) . } } OPTIONAL { ?Publication retmop:PageRange ?PageRange . } OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:Note ?EditedTextNote } OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:PageRangeOfEditedText ?PageRangeOfEditedText } ?EditedText retmop:IsEditionOf ?Work . ?Work retmop:Has_subobject ?AuthorshipSubobject . ?Work retmop:Title ?WorkTitle . ?AuthorshipSubobject a retmoc:Authorship . ?AuthorshipSubobject retmop:WorkCreator ?Author . ?AuthorshipSubobject retmop:WorkAuthorshipAttribution "Echt" . ?Author retmop:Name ?AuthorName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?AuthorName,' : ',?WorkTitle,'
    • ') as ?WorkAuthor) . OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:IsTranslationOf ?Translation . ?EditedText retmop:Language ?Language . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?Language,'
    • ') as ?aLanguage) . } OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:IsEditionOfWorkPart ?WorkPart . ?WorkPart retmop:Heading ?WorkPartHeading . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?WorkPartHeading,'
    • ') as ?aWorkPart) . } } GROUP BY ?Publication ORDER BY LCASE(?Titel) |config=fuseki |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} {{#set: Name={{{Name}}} }} {{DISPLAYTITLE:{{{Name}}}{{#if:{{{Affiliation|}}}|, {{#show: {{{Affiliation}}}|?organizationAbbreviation }}|}}{{#if:{{{NameAddition|}}}|, {{{NameAddition}}}|}} }} [[Category:Editor]] {{CopyPageId}}

Entspricht (bei Sammelbänden) crossref in BibTeX Einträgen. Bezeichnung orientiert an neuem DataCite-Relationstype IsPublishedIn }} |{{#arraymap:{{{IsPublishedIn|}}}|,|x1|

<includeonly>
{{#sparql:
PREFIX retmop: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/Property-3A>
PREFIX page: <http://alcuin.soital.de/index.php/Special:URIResolver/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
SELECT ?Datum WHERE 
{ 
    page:{{PAGENAMEE}} retmop:Has_subobject ?z .
    ?z retmop:EventType "{{{EventType}}}" .
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:Date ?DateStart .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateEnd ?DateEnd .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateCertain ?dc .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateVague ?dv .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateCertain ?dec .}
    OPTIONAL {?z retmop:DateVague ?dev .}
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dc), ?dc, 0) AS ?DateCertain) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dv), ?dv, 0) AS ?DateVague) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dec), ?dec, 0) AS ?DateEndCertain) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?dev), ?dev, 0) AS ?DateEndVague) .
    BIND (
        IF(
            ?DateCertain,
            CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))),
            CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), " (?)")
        ) as ?a
    ) .
    BIND (
        IF(
            ?DateEndCertain,
            CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd))),
            CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd)), " (?)")
        ) as ?b
    ) .
    BIND (IF(BOUND(?DateEnd), CONCAT(?a, " - ", ?b), ?a) as ?Datum) .
}
|chart=sgvizler.visualization.Table
|options=headings=false
}}
</includeonly>
<noinclude>
[[Category:Query]]
</noinclude>

    |DateCertain={{{DateCertain|}}}
    |DateEnd={{#if:{{{DateEnd|}}}|{{{DateEnd}}} Gr|}}
    |DateEndVague={{{DateEndVague|}}}
    |DateEndCertain={{{DateEndCertain|}}}

}}

Inkunabel {{#info: Wiegenkatalog-Nummerierung eines Wiegendruckes (Inkunabel). Inkunabeln/Wiegendrucke wurden zwischen 1454 (Druck der Gutenberg-Bibel) und dem 31. Dezember 1500 gedruckt. Die Katalognummern kommen meist aus dem Repertorium bibliographicum von Hain (z.B. 'Hain 487'), dem Gesamtkatalog der Wiegendrucke (GW), oder auch den Ergänzungen von Copinger (z.B. 'Copinger 615'). Siehe auch folgende Webseite mit einer tabellarischen Übersicht typischer Muster der Signaturen von Wiegendrucken: https://www.cerl.org/help/incunabula/shelfmark_patterns }}

{{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: PREFIX rdf: SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPublicationAuthor) AS ?Autor) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPlaceName) AS ?Ort) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPublisher) AS ?Verlag) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?PublicationDate) AS ?Jahr) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPublication) AS ?Titel) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aCollectionEditor) AS ?Sammelbandherausgeber) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aSeriesEditor) AS ?Herausgeber) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aSeries) AS ?Reihe) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aBandnummer) AS ?Bandnummer) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?PageRange) AS ?Seitenangabe) WHERE { page:{{PAGENAMEE}} retmop:Has_subobject ?LiteratureReference . ?LiteratureReference a retmoc:LiteratureReference . ?LiteratureReference retmop:LiteratureReferencePublication ?Publication . OPTIONAL { ?Publication retmop:PublicationAuthor ?PublicationAuthor . ?PublicationAuthor retmop:Name ?PublicationAuthorName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PublicationAuthorName,'
    • ') as ?aPublicationAuthor) . } ?Publication retmop:Title ?Title . BIND(CONCAT(?Title,'') as ?aPublication) . OPTIONAL { ?Publication retmop:CollectionEditor ?CollectionEditor . ?CollectionEditor retmop:Name ?CollectionEditorName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?CollectionEditorName,'
    • ') as ?aCollectionEditor) . } OPTIONAL { ?Publication retmop:Series ?Series . ?Series retmop:SeriesTitle ?SeriesTitle . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?SeriesTitle,'
    • ') as ?aSeries) . ?Series retmop:SeriesEditor ?SeriesEditor . ?SeriesEditor retmop:Name ?SeriesEditorName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?SeriesEditorName,'
    • ') as ?aSeriesEditor) . } OPTIONAL { ?Publication retmop:Volume ?Volume . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?Volume,'
    • ') as ?aBandnummer) . } OPTIONAL { ?Publication retmop:Has_subobject ?Print . ?Print a retmoc:Print . OPTIONAL { ?Print retmop:PublicationPlace/retmop:PlaceName ?PlaceName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PlaceName,'
    • ') as ?aPlaceName) . } OPTIONAL { ?Print retmop:Publisher ?Publisher . ?Publisher retmop:OrganizationName ?PublisherName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PublisherName,'
    • ') as ?aPublisher) . } OPTIONAL { ?Print retmop:Date ?DateStart . OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateEnd ?DateEnd .} OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateCertain ?dc .} OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateVague ?dv .} OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateEndCertain ?dec .} OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateEndVague ?dev .} BIND (IF(BOUND(?dc), ?dc, 0) AS ?DateCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dv), ?dv, 0) AS ?DateVague) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dec), ?dec, 0) AS ?DateEndCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dev), ?dev, 0) AS ?DateEndVague) . BIND ( IF( ?DateCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))), CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), " (?)") ) as ?DateStartConcated ) . BIND ( IF( ?DateEndCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd))), CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd)), " (?)") ) as ?DateEndConcated ) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?DateEnd), CONCAT(?DateStartConcated, " - ", ?DateEndConcated), ?DateStartConcated) as ?PublicationDate) . } } } GROUP BY ?Publication ORDER BY LCASE(?Titel) |config=fuseki |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }}     [[Category:Query]]

Manuskript {{#info: Ein Manuskript ist eine unikale Manifestation des Textes eines oder mehrerer Werke. Typischerweise ist die Zitationsangabe zu einem Manuskript ist wie folgt strukturiert: Ort, Bibliothek/Archiv, Signatur, ggf. Folio-Angaben }}

{|class="wikitable smwtable" !Signatur des Manuskripts |[[Shelfmark::{{{Shelfmark}}}]] |- !Im Besitz von {{#info: Angabe der Einrichtung, in deren Besitz sich das Manuskript befindet }} |[[HeldBy::{{{HeldBy}}}]] |- !Standort |[[Place::{{{Place}}}]] |} ===Liste der im Manuskript enthaltenen Autoren und Werke=== {{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: PREFIX rdf: SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aAuthor) AS ?Autor) (CONCAT('
    ', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Synonym), '
') AS ?Namenssynonyme) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?WorkAuthorshipAttribution) AS ?Authentizität) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aWork) AS ?Werktitel) (CONCAT('
    ', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aAlternateTitle), '
') AS ?Titelvarianten) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aWorkType) AS ?Textgattung) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aIncipit) AS ?Incipit) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aFolioRange) AS ?Folioangabe) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPageRange) AS ?Seitenbereich) WHERE { ?Work retmop:Has_subobject ?Subobject . ?Subobject a retmoc:ManuscriptReference . ?Subobject retmop:ManuscriptReferenceCodex page:{{PAGENAMEE}} . ?Work retmop:Title ?WorkTitle . BIND(CONCAT(?WorkTitle, '') as ?aWork) . OPTIONAL { ?Work retmop:Has_subobject ?bSubobject . ?bSubobject a retmoc:Authorship . ?bSubobject retmop:WorkCreator ?Author . ?Author retmop:Name ?AuthorName . BIND(CONCAT(?AuthorName, '') as ?aAuthor) . { SELECT ?Author ?Synonym WHERE { ?Author retmop:VariantName ?VariantName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ', ?VariantName, '
    • ') AS ?Synonym) . } ORDER BY LCASE(?VariantName) } ?bSubobject retmop:WorkAuthorshipAttribution ?WorkAuthorshipAttribution } OPTIONAL { SELECT ?Work ?aAlternateTitle WHERE { ?Work retmop:AlternateTitle ?AlternateTitle . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ', ?AlternateTitle, '
    • ') AS ?aAlternateTitle) . } ORDER BY LCASE(?AlternateTitle) } OPTIONAL { ?Work retmop:WorkType ?aWorkType } OPTIONAL { ?Subobject retmop:Incipit ?aIncipit } OPTIONAL { ?Subobject retmop:FolioRange ?aFolioRange } OPTIONAL { ?Subobject retmop:PageRange ?aPageRange } } GROUP BY ?Author ORDER BY LCASE(?aAuthor) |config=fuseki |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} [[Category:Manuscript]] {{#vardefine: Source|{{{Source|}}}}} {{#vardefine: Provenance|{{{Provenance|}}}}} {{#vardefine: HcsIdentifier|{{{HcsIdentifier|}}}}} {| !Quelle {{#info: Quellen der integrierten Daten. In der Regel Angabe des Dateinamens der Quelldatei }} !Herkunft {{#info: Provenienz der integrierten Daten. Je nach Herkunft der Daten: 'ALCUIN', 'RETM2', oder 'RETM3' }} !HCS-ID {{#info: ID des Eintrags im Handschriftencensus (HCS) }} |- |[[Source::{{#var:Source}}]] |[[Provenance::{{#var:Provenance}}]] |[[HcsIdentifier::{{#var:HcsIdentifier}}]] |} {{CopyPageId}}

  • [[Reuses::x1]]

  • [[Volume::x1]]
  • |}} |} ===Liste aller in der Monographie edierten Autoren und Werke=== {{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: PREFIX rdf: SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?WorkAuthor) AS ?Autor_Werk) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?PageRange) AS ?Seitenbereich) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?EditedTextNote) AS ?Zuschreibung_Autorenschaft) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aLanguage) AS ?Übersetzung) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aWorkPart) AS ?Werkteil) WHERE { page:{{PAGENAMEE}} retmop:Incorporates ?EditedText . ?EditedText retmop:IsEditionOf ?Work . ?Work retmop:Has_subobject ?AuthorshipSubobject . ?Work retmop:Title ?WorkTitle . ?AuthorshipSubobject a retmoc:Authorship . ?AuthorshipSubobject retmop:WorkCreator ?Author . ?AuthorshipSubobject retmop:WorkAuthorshipAttribution "Echt" . ?Author retmop:Name ?AuthorName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?AuthorName,' : ',?WorkTitle,'
    • ') as ?WorkAuthor) . OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:PageRangeOfEditedText ?PageRange } OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:Note ?EditedTextNote } OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:IsTranslationOf ?Translation . ?EditedText retmop:Language ?Language . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?Language,'
    • ') as ?aLanguage) . } OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:IsEditionOfWorkPart ?WorkPart . ?WorkPart retmop:Heading ?WorkPartHeading . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?WorkPartHeading,'
    • ') as ?aWorkPart) . } } GROUP BY ?EditedText ORDER BY ?Autor_Werk |config=fuseki |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} {{#vardefine: SiglumIdentifier|{{{SiglumIdentifier|}}}}} {{#vardefine: Isbn|{{{Isbn|}}}}} {| !Siglum {{#info: Siglum eines Werks (z.B. 'Fauser 10' oder 'CALMA 29') }} !ISBN {{#info: ISBN (International Standard Book Number) eines Buches }} |- |{{#arraymap:{{#var:SiglumIdentifier}}|,|x1|[[SiglumIdentifier::x1]]|}} |[[Isbn::{{#var:Isbn}}]] |} [[Category:Monograph]] {{CopyPageId}}

OPTIONAL { ?Publication retmop:PublicationAuthor ?PublicationAuthor . ?PublicationAuthor retmop:Name ?PublicationAuthorName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PublicationAuthorName,'

  • ',?Title,'

  • ',?Volume,'
    • ') as ?aBandnummer) . } OPTIONAL { ?Publication retmop:Has_subobject ?Print . ?Print a retmoc:Print . ?Print retmop:Date ?DateStart . OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateEnd ?DateEnd .} OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateCertain ?dc .} OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateVague ?dv .} OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateEndCertain ?dec .} OPTIONAL {?Print retmop:DateEndVague ?dev .} BIND (IF(BOUND(?dc), ?dc, 0) AS ?DateCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dv), ?dv, 0) AS ?DateVague) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dec), ?dec, 0) AS ?DateEndCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dev), ?dev, 0) AS ?DateEndVague) . BIND ( IF( ?DateCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))), CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), " (?)") ) as ?DateStartConcated ) . BIND ( IF( ?DateEndCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd))), CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd)), " (?)") ) as ?DateEndConcated ) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?DateEnd), CONCAT(?DateStartConcated, " - ", ?DateEndConcated), ?DateStartConcated) as ?PublicationDate) . } ?Publication retmop:Incorporates ?EditedText . OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:Note ?EditedTextNote } OPTIONAL { ?EditedText retmop:PageRangeOfEditedText ?PageRangeOfEditedText } ?EditedText retmop:IsEditionOf ?Work . ?Work retmop:Has_subobject ?AuthorshipSubobject . ?Work retmop:Title ?WorkTitle . ?AuthorshipSubobject a retmoc:Authorship . ?AuthorshipSubobject retmop:WorkCreator ?Author . ?AuthorshipSubobject retmop:WorkAuthorshipAttribution "Echt" . ?Author retmop:Name ?AuthorName . BIND(CONCAT('

  • ',?Language,'

  • ',?WorkPartHeading,'

{{Organisation|OrganizationName={{{OrganizationName|}}}|OrganizationAbbreviation={{{OrganizationAbbreviation|}}}|GndIdentifier={{{GndIdentifier|}}}}} ===Liste aller Autoren des Ordens=== {{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: PREFIX rdf: SELECT (SAMPLE(?aLink) as ?Link) (SAMPLE(?aName) as ?Name) (CONCAT('
    ', GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Synonym), '
') AS ?Namenssynonyme) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aTätigkeit) as ?Tätigkeit) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Birth) as ?Geburt) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Death) as ?Tod) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Wirkungsort) as ?Wirkungsorte) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?Wirkungszeit) as ?Wirkungszeitraum) WHERE { ?Page retmop:Affiliation page:{{PAGENAMEE}} . ?Page retmop:Name ?aName . BIND(CONCAT('') as ?aLink) . OPTIONAL { SELECT ?Page ?Synonym WHERE { ?Page retmop:VariantName ?VariantName . BIND(IF(BOUND(?VariantName), CONCAT('
  • ', ?VariantName, '
    • '), "") AS ?Synonym) . } ORDER BY LCASE(?VariantName) } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?Event . ?Event retmop:EventType "Tätigkeit" . ?Event retmop:EventDescription ?EventDescription . BIND(IF(BOUND(?EventDescription), CONCAT('
  • ', ?EventDescription, '
    • '), "") AS ?aTätigkeit) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?bEvent . ?bEvent retmop:EventType "Geburt" . OPTIONAL { ?bEvent retmop:Place/retmop:PlaceName ?bPlace . } OPTIONAL { ?bEvent retmop:Date ?bDate . } BIND(CONCAT('Ort: ', IF(BOUND(?bPlace), ?bPlace, ""), '
    ', 'Jahr: ', IF(BOUND(?bDate), STR(YEAR(?bDate)), ""), '
    ') as ?Birth) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?cEvent . ?cEvent retmop:EventType "Tod" . OPTIONAL { ?cEvent retmop:Place/retmop:PlaceName ?cPlace . } OPTIONAL { ?cEvent retmop:Date ?cDate . } BIND(CONCAT('Ort: ', IF(BOUND(?cPlace), ?cPlace, ""), '
    ', 'Jahr: ', IF(BOUND(?cDate), STR(YEAR(?cDate)), ""), '
    ') as ?Death) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?dEvent . ?dEvent retmop:EventType "Wirkungsort" . ?dEvent retmop:Place/retmop:PlaceName ?dPlace . BIND(IF(BOUND(?dPlace), CONCAT('
  • ', ?dPlace, '
    • '), "") AS ?Wirkungsort) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?eEvent . ?eEvent retmop:EventType "Wirkungszeitraum" . ?eEvent retmop:Date ?DateStart . OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateEnd ?DateEnd .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateCertain ?dc .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateVague ?dv .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateEndCertain ?dec .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateEndVague ?dev .} BIND (IF(BOUND(?dc), ?dc, 0) AS ?DateCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dv), ?dv, 0) AS ?DateVague) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dec), ?dec, 0) AS ?DateEndCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dev), ?dev, 0) AS ?DateEndVague) . BIND ( IF( ?DateCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))), CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), " (?)") ) as ?DateStartConcated ) . BIND ( IF( ?DateEndCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd))), CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd)), " (?)") ) as ?DateEndConcated ) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?DateEnd), CONCAT(?DateStartConcated, " - ", ?DateEndConcated), ?DateStartConcated) as ?Wirkungszeit) . } } GROUP BY ?Page ORDER BY ?Name |config=fuseki |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} [[Category:Order]] {{CopyPageId}}

BIND(CONCAT('

BIND (IF(BOUND(?dv), ?dv, 0) AS ?DateVague) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dec), ?dec, 0) AS ?DateEndCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dev), ?dev, 0) AS ?DateEndVague) . BIND ( IF( ?DateCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))), CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), " (?)") ) as ?DateStartConcated ) . BIND ( IF( ?DateEndCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd))), CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd)), " (?)") ) as ?DateEndConcated ) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?DateEnd), CONCAT(?DateStartConcated, " - ", ?DateEndConcated), ?DateStartConcated) as ?PublicationDate) . } } GROUP BY ?Publication ORDER BY LCASE(?Titel) |config=fuseki |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }} [[Category:Printer]] {{CopyPageId}}

{{#sparql: PREFIX retmoc: PREFIX retmop: PREFIX page: PREFIX rdfs: PREFIX rdf: SELECT (SAMPLE(?aLink) as ?Link) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aEditor) as ?Editor) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPrinter) as ?Drucker) (SAMPLE(?Title) as ?Titel) (SAMPLE(?PublicationPlace) as ?Ort) (SAMPLE(?PublicationDate) as ?Jahr) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aPublisher) as ?Verlag) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aHerausgeber) AS ?Herausgeber) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aBandnummer) AS ?Bandnummer) (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?aSeitenangabe) AS ?Seitenangabe) WHERE { ?Page a/rdfs:subClassOf retmoc:Publication . {{#if: {{{Editor|}}}| ?Page retmop:Incorporates ?searchEdition . ?searchEdition retmop:Editor ?searchEditorPage. ?searchEditorPage retmop:Name{{!}}retmop:VariantName ?searchName filter contains(lcase(?searchName), lcase("{{{Editor}}}") ) . }} {{#if: {{{Printer|}}}| ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?searchPrinterSubobject . ?searchPrinterSubobject a retmoc:Print . ?searchPrinterSubobject retmop:Printer/retmop:OrganizationName{{!}}retmop:OrganizationAbbreviation ?searchPrinter filter contains(lcase(?searchPrinter), lcase("{{{Printer}}}") ) . }} {{#if: {{{PublicationTitle|}}}| ?Page retmop:Title ?searchTitle filter contains(lcase(?searchTitle), lcase("{{{PublicationTitle}}}") ) . }} {{#if: {{{PublicationPlace|}}}| ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?searchPlaceSubobject . ?searchPlaceSubobject a retmoc:Print . ?searchPlaceSubobject retmop:PublicationPlace/retmop:PlaceName ?searchPlace filter contains(lcase(?searchPlace), lcase("{{{PublicationPlace}}}") ) . }} {{#if: {{{PublicationYear|}}}| ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?searchDateSubobject . ?searchDateSubobject a retmoc:Print . ?searchDateSubobject retmop:Date{{!}}retmop:DateEnd ?searchDate filter contains(STR(?searchDate), "{{{PublicationYear}}}" ) . }} {{#if: {{{Publisher|}}}| ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?searchPublisherSubobject . ?searchPublisherSubobject a retmoc:Print . ?searchPublisherSubobject retmop:Publisher/retmop:OrganizationName{{!}}retmop:OrganizationAbbreviation ?searchPublisher filter contains(lcase(?searchPublisher), lcase("{{{Publisher}}}") ) . }} ?Page retmop:Title ?Title . BIND(CONCAT('') as ?aLink) . OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Incorporates ?Edition . ?Edition retmop:Editor ?EditorPage. ?EditorPage rdfs:label ?EditorLabel . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?EditorLabel,'
    • ') as ?aEditor) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?aPrint . ?aPrint a retmoc:Print . ?aPrint retmop:Printer ?PrinterPage . ?PrinterPage retmop:OrganizationName ?PrinterName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PrinterName,'
    • ') as ?aPrinter) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?bPrint . ?bPrint a retmoc:Print . ?bPrint retmop:PublicationPlace/retmop:PlaceName ?PublicationPlace . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?cPrint . ?cPrint a retmoc:Print . ?cPrint retmop:Date ?DateStart . OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateEnd ?DateEnd .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateCertain ?dc .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateVague ?dv .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateEndCertain ?dec .} OPTIONAL {?eEvent retmop:DateEndVague ?dev .} BIND (IF(BOUND(?dc), ?dc, 0) AS ?DateCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dv), ?dv, 0) AS ?DateVague) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dec), ?dec, 0) AS ?DateEndCertain) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?dev), ?dev, 0) AS ?DateEndVague) . BIND ( IF( ?DateCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart))), CONCAT(IF(?DateVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateStart), "Z"), STR(?DateStart)), " (?)") ) as ?DateStartConcated ) . BIND ( IF( ?DateEndCertain, CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd))), CONCAT(IF(?DateEndVague, "ca. ", ""), IF(CONTAINS(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STRBEFORE(STR(?DateEnd), "Z"), STR(?DateEnd)), " (?)") ) as ?DateEndConcated ) . BIND (IF(BOUND(?DateEnd), CONCAT(?DateStartConcated, " - ", ?DateEndConcated), ?DateStartConcated) as ?PublicationDate) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Has_subobject ?dPrint . ?dPrint a retmoc:Print . ?dPrint retmop:Publisher ?PublisherPage. ?PublisherPage retmop:OrganizationName ?PublisherName . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PublisherName,'
    • ') as ?aPublisher) . } OPTIONAL { { ?Page retmop:CollectionEditor ?CollectionEditor . } UNION { ?Page retmop:Series ?Series . ?Series retmop:SeriesEditor ?CollectionEditor . } ?CollectionEditor rdfs:label ?CollectionEditorTitle BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?CollectionEditorTitle,'
    • ') as ?aHerausgeber) . } OPTIONAL { ?Page retmop:Volume ?Volume . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?Volume,'
    • ') as ?aBandnummer) . } OPTIONAL { ?InCollection retmop:IsPublishedIn ?Page . ?InCollection retmop:PageRange ?PageRange . BIND(CONCAT('
  • ',?PageRange,'
    • ') as ?aSeitenangabe) . } } GROUP BY ?Page ORDER BY LCASE(?Titel) |chart=bordercloud.visualization.DataTable |options=width=100%!height=500px |log=2 }}     [[Category:Query]]
